website_summaries.verdict: A double-ended stylus that can be used on either smaller smartphone screens or tablets.
pros: Compact but long enough to hold comfortably
Tips are easy to replace, and extras are included
Double-sided pen has a larger tip on one end and a smaller one for precise use
cons: Will not work if device has a screen protector
Tips aren’t very sensitive and do not work well for handwriting on screens
Tips can split after only a few hours of use

customer_reviews.title: The perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I like having a choice of of tip size and very happy with the length of the stylus. I have been using a shorter one which had come in a ten pack which 4 of them were missing the tips and the other tips would split after a couple of weeks of use. I like that it comes with 20 extra tips. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: ... screen protector on your device these are next to useless. You have to press for at least a ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a screen protector on your device these are next to useless. You have to press for at least a second to get a response. Update: I returmed the Stylus'. The seller contacted me and sent me a Iveko high sensitivity styus to try instead. the large end is still slow to repond but the disc end is great. Odd to look at, but got used to it quickly. Works well on both of my devices. I am going to order another. Great customer service from Sarah.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY C

customer_reviews.title: For Some Devices, Have to Press Hard for Screen to Respond
customer_reviews.text: We are using four different brands of stylus with our mobile devices. They all work very well. Recently, I bought this well-reviewed brand, it does not work that well. Unlike all our old styli, I need to press hard on some devices to make the screen respond. That makes writing and drawing very difficult on those devices. Some reviewers mentioned that this brand of stylus only works without screen protector. Here are my testing results: iPad 2 w/o protector - OK iPad Air (1st Gen) w/Protector - No iPhone 6S+ w/Protector - No iPad Pro 9.7 w/Protector - OK Samsung Galaxy S8 w/Protector - OK HP ENVY Laptop 17 w/o Protector - OK
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for iPads
customer_reviews.text: These work great on my iPad Pro for my artwork. I have spent so much money on stylists and I have the expensive iPad pen. These do the trick plus they work on all of your iPads across the board not just one device, like the iPad pen.
customer_reviews.author: MISSISSIPPI QUEEN

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Responsive on my Lenovo Tablet. Tips Split Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Not responsive on my Lenovo Android tablet. Have to press hard for it to work. Tips wear out (split) quickly. Probably because I have to press so hard. Appears the material the tips are made of is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: So annoyed
customer_reviews.text: To soon to tell if they hold up well but they don't do their job well at all. I have to tap several times before it recognizes anything, which makes texting very difficult. Not what I expected after all the good reviews they got which is why I ordered them. This is so annoying. I'm going to give them 1 🌟 because they look and feel like a real pen but that's the only thing I like about them
customer_reviews.author: Portia Silcox

customer_reviews.title: Risky
customer_reviews.text: It works well but, the tips don’t last long at all. They do give you extras which is great however, if you do not inspect your tips regularly, you stand the chance of scratching your screen. I happened to notice my tip was cracked and right below it is the metal point- I got super lucky, that I noticed when I did. The tips are not thick at all. I definitely would not re-order or recommend because of the strong chance of scratching your screen. The ones in the bag were already all dried out and they were in the original little ziptop bag provided so they are not going last long either.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona T.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: This stylus is wonderful! I'm disabled and must use a stylus for everything phone/tablet-related, and these are perfect. For closer work I use the small tip but switch them out frequently and easily. The clip on the "lid" makes storage easy, and the tips are easy to replace. (I'm forever dropping one and I'm hard on them.) I've purchased them before and am now placing my third order because I tend to lose them or share with others (everyone I see wants one!), not because they're poor quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Libby-Evans

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You’ll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product doing what I expected it to. What I was also pleased with were the extras that were included with my purchase! For what I considered to be an inexpensive price, I received 4 Styli each in its own protective sleeve. As if that wasn’t enough, each stylus had different sized tips; a larger one and a a smaller one. They also include many extra tips for both sized tips. I keep one in my car, one in my office,one at home and one to carry with me. How convenient! When I only had one, it was difficult to keep up with, and that would cause me delays. I’m so glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a regular pen 😃
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stylus pens they are heavier than most of the pens I have bought. These feel like a regular pen. I like that they have 2 different size tips. I always bought both sizes small tips and large tips. this is great having one pen and getting both small and large tips. I also like that you can replace the tips. I would have given it 5 stars if the tips lasted longer. Some last great but some don't. I'm not sure if I just got some dudes. I am hoping that when I have too buy more tips that all of them last longer. Other than that I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Tonch

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product title and text says it comes with 4 styluses and 20 replacement tips. They are there - you just have to follow the advice on the card that provides contact info. Take everything out of the package and you'll find 4 stylus pens, 2 packages of tips, and two cards - one tells you how to replace the tips, the other provides the seller's contact info and place to send an email to be enrolled in the 12-month warranty. The stylus itself has a great weight in the hand, is long enough to be comfortable, and does well in navigating my screen. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: R. Glickman

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Wacom Bamboo stylus!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used A Wacom Bamboo brand stylus for years. The replacement nibs are hard to find and expensive (3 for $10 if you can even find them.). Also, they last way less than they used to as the nibs are now pretty thin. I came across Bargain Depots stylus that comes with four pens and 20 nibs. Same cost as Wacom brand 3 pack of nibs only. I’m very happy as they work as well or even better than the old ones. These nibs looked to be about the same size as the Wacom brand and when I put one into the Bamboo stylus it fit and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: MsJongg

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Stylus Pens
customer_reviews.text: These stylus pens are lovely! I put one in my purse, one in my tablet bag, one on my desk, and gave one away! The smaller end is perfect for my phone and the larger end is perfect for my tablet! The tips require little to no pressure and glide smoothly across the screen. The only thing that would make them better is if both ends had protective caps.
customer_reviews.author: RedKittyTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: works better than my fat fingers
customer_reviews.text: I have thick fingers and continuously hitting 2 characters or the wrong one on my mobile phone keyboard. These stylus are thin tipped and worked better that some of the thicker ones out there on the marked and appear to be more sensitive to the touch. I don't have to press hard on the screen keyboard to get a character to display. I also like the fact that these are double tipped and also come with replacement tips as well. I have one in my car, office, kitchen, bedroom and fanny pack. They seem to clean better than some previous models I had purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Nolting

customer_reviews.title: Good fine tip rubber stylus.
customer_reviews.text: The stylus pack came as described. The colors are nice and the tips are smaller than the regular tips which help them to be more accurate. I also like the string attachment sizes to choose from. I have a Samsung Galaxy S5 with a screen protector and these work fine on my phone. I will add this though, on the same day I ordered these, I also ordered a pack of stylus with a "hybrid tip" made of microfiber. I do prefer the microfiber tip stylus more because it seems to respond better. The microfiber tip stylus has a bigger head though so it's harder to be accurate on very small items. The microfiber tip stylus I ordered are here:
customer_reviews.author: Bhealthy1

customer_reviews.title: BEST I'VE FOUND
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stylus'. They are long and sleek and the best part is they come with replacement tips. I have gone through a lot of stylus' since I use them on my tablet and the tips ultimately wear through very quickly. I must say I am impressed with these. They are well made and I haven't had to replace the tips yet. It may take a couple of days to adjust to them since they are not a "spongy" as other stylus'. I am really happy with these and would order again. By the way, the price was great too!!
customer_reviews.author: Marion Fratus

customer_reviews.title: Good but tips don't last that long
customer_reviews.text: Good but tips don't last that long. But I'm guessing that all products like this suffer the same issue. The tips start out great and are super smooth. But after a couple of weeks of daily use they start sticking and you have to replace them. If anyone here has a solution to make these rubber tips last longer PLEASE POST HERE.
customer_reviews.author: Bill White

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought stylus pens from a store and tried them out. They didn't work out too well. I purchased these and the first night I started using them, they worked really good. I didn't have to press the screen very hard like I had to with the ones I bought at the store. I use these for a tablet my company uses for clients in a home health agency.
customer_reviews.author: Tinabop187

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus set for drawing apps, great value, extra tips
customer_reviews.text: Love these styluses. I use them for drawing apps like Draw Something and Color Therapy so a stylus on iPhone X is better than finger. These are full size compared to a regular pen. Works great on my screen. They are attractive metallic in different colored sets. There’s a small tip under the cap (the cap fits either end!) There’s no need to buy more tips as plenty of extras came with purchase. I can stash one in my purse, keep one in living room, keep one in car, and one in my home office. I photographed it with a pen so you can see the size. I’d definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa JF

customer_reviews.title: Two tips, perfect length, easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: These styli are the perfect length for me, about 5-1/2" long - not as long as a pencil but longer than the short ones. Another plus, one that I really like, is the fact that these are not overly slippery to hold, so they stay in my hand and do not slide around like most stylii. The special feature is the two sizes of rubber tips, small (0.18") on one end, and large (0.25") on other, with a cap to cover either end you are not using. With plenty of extra tips, a bonus. All in all, a good buy for the money. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dry Heat

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use on my touch screen iPhone and iPad, but they work so poorly that its not worth it, even though they are attractive with pretty colors.. As a touch instrument for drawing, scrolling, or anything else they are very difficult, if at all. For keyboard I have to really hit the touch screen pretty hard with the stylus to make it work. One size rubber tip works better than the other size, but both are poor. I have other cheap pen stylus that work much much better. Overall this purchase was a waste of money and I am sorry I gave a few to family members too.
customer_reviews.author: Angie A

customer_reviews.title: Durable Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Well made, excellent packaging. I loved how the stylus are individually wrapped then put in a pouch. The colors are so vibrant i love the red and the purple is a real cool color purple. 2 ends with different sizes and plenty of extra rubber tips. The only thing i did wrong was try to turn the cap off the small end. Just pull the cap. I love these and im sure i will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: paula santos

customer_reviews.title: One side of the stylus is good and nice to the touch works fine
customer_reviews.text: One side of the stylus is good and nice to the touch works fine. But the other side where the cap is, is terrible. Cap constantly falls off and the stylus has to repeatedly be pressed against the screen for it to actually work. And it is that way with all 4 of the them. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Moncrieffe

customer_reviews.title: Great stylus!
customer_reviews.text: We've bought stylus' before, but this one actually lasts. We've had them a couple of weeks now and they're still working like they did when new. Other stylus' we've bought & paid more for, didn't last even 1 month. These are comfortable and has 2 tips per stylus. We haven't had to change them yet, but changing them is easy. Just unscrew the cap and replace the black tip. Both my husband & I like these! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great during pandemic
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I did not want to touch screens at the ATM. However, I can not tell you how much more I have used them. I use them daily for the elevators in my apartment building. When I need to sign at the desk on a pad to get packages from the doorman. Biggest use is for supermarkets with self check out I never touch any of the stores screens. If I need to enter a telephone number for stores discount cards I just use this to put in the number. I find for me it eases a bit of stress during these trying times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find this ideal to use with Pixel 2 phone and Acer laptop
customer_reviews.text: I have searched a long time for a smaller tip stylus. I like these very much. 4 star on easy to hold because they are straight and I have arthritic hand. I can add a finger hold for my special need. Not lightweight, but not as heavy as some I've used. Both tips are responsive with a light tap on both phone and Acer laptop screen. I sent a link to a friend, who like me, is in search of a good stylus. Having two tips is the cherry on the top of the sundae, so to speak. Lots of extra tips came with set of four.
customer_reviews.author: P. Breneman

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: These stylus pens are very nice. They are sturdy and visually appealing. Originally, I got the pens to use for virtual teaching, but they didn't work well on my Viewboard. Probably because it's 24 inches and needs a larger tip. However, I've been using them on my cell phone instead and they work great! The customer service even offered to help me out by sending another pen that would work better on my Viewboard. I really appreciate their willingness to help me. This is a great company!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Premus

customer_reviews.title: Love Having the Smaller Tip
customer_reviews.text: Product is very comfortable to hold and use. The only criticism is the cap only fits over the small tip so that when you are using the small tip there is no place for the cap and could easily get lost. Would be excellent if the cap could be screwed over either end.
customer_reviews.author: E. Berry

customer_reviews.title: WAAY better than my finger!
customer_reviews.text: After all these years, I can draw and write with ease on my phone (which also has a Verizon protective film). Minus one star due to the fair amount of frequency with which I have to go over what I'm trying to draw (or start over) because the "connection" isn't quite there with the screen. The fact that it has a cap and two different sized ends is a great and the extra tips is a bonus. I glued one of the extra tips onto my mini pen that I carry in my purse and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: What is Not to Like?  Fantastic Stylus Set! Plus Extra Tips! Best Stylus I've Found to Date!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stylus - perfect length, lovely colors and really like the smaller tip. They work great on my Fire tablet, my Kindle Paperwhite AND on my iPhone. Especially like that they are NOT ballpoint pen and stylus combined - though the combo ones I've had have worked well, I never use the pen part and often they loosen after time from being held in your hand and you have to keep tightening the two parts together. Plus, really like the additional tips that come with these - that's the part that wears out the soonest and having extra ones is like getting a couple more sets of stylus for free!!
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Scogin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for touch screens
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This came quickly, just as the seller said it would. Love the longer length and improved version, with a slightly heavier weight to it. Love the colors, the cap and clip, and the 2 different tips, as sometimes the larger tip isn't very accurate to use on smaller touch screens. We felt the price was great, considering the qualities of this product and would happily buy from this seller again. My only regret was that I didn't notice the 2 yr protection plan, but we're planning on these lasting a long time, so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: C J Langhoff

customer_reviews.title: Best stylus - precision, comfort, & pretty jewel colors!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best styli I've found, and I've tried many. The size & length fit my small hand comfortably, and better than any 4-5" stylus I've tried. Two differently sized tips allow precision, while the extra tips will allow me to keep using them long after other styli must be discarded. The beautiful jewel colors are a bonus for someone who likes pretty things, and are easy to find when I've put one down on cluttered surface. I've already bought a second set so I can have one hand wherever I am!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix 22

customer_reviews.title: Stylists
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry for the last review I use voice and it misinterpreted a word that should’ve said bunch. Anyways I’ll repeat it, I have ordered from them before and I received the stylists to which I gave a lot of them to my friends and ended up with none for myself as I lost the only one that I kept. I re-ordered& I received them and now I’m so very happy that I have them and I’m not going to give any more away. They are very easy to use, very precise, and just the right size Thank you. Sincerely Ms. Jaafil
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jaafil

customer_reviews.title: These were a big dud!  Didn't work on iPhone or Kindle.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use with my iPhone and Kindle Fire. I was looking for a stylus that was longer than the little tiny ones I have been using. There is something about the tips that just don't work with my iphone and Kindle. I had to keep pressing the screen and pressing the screen for the stylus to make any type of connection. I tried all 4 stylus's and even switched out all the tips. I am sticking with my tiny stylus's at least they work and they come with a plug so that I can attach to my phone. These did come with any plugs. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy users
customer_reviews.text: Junk styluses. Rubber falls off, and for students that use iPads heavily (ie. math, physics work), it requires several erases and re-writes, the tips are not precise when writing. Absolute junk. We thought we could save from buying Meko styluses, but would rather invest $10 more and keep it longer and get less frustrated. Really surprised to see all the good reviews. For light users, just playing around may be OK, but for heavy usage, skip. MHO
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, works great! Hope it lasts,I've only had it a week, so far so good. Bought this because my finger tips get sore texting and using cell phone due to nerve condition. Using the pen stops that. Glad I bought this. Gave one to my mother n law she has arthritis fingers and its hard for her to text. She likes using the pen also with her cell phone
customer_reviews.author: mlh22

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to hold and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I love these styli! They're not only attractive but they're easy and comfortable to hold even for long periods of time. The tips are very accurate; I especially like the smaller tip because it's more accurate when tapping on small things. The cap fits on either end and is held securely. The additional/replacement tips are a real bonus. I had bought a different type earlier this year but didn't like them as much as these because they're so short, unable to change tips, and the color is wearing off of them. The styli from Bargains Depot are the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Mike44NH

customer_reviews.title: Not for cell phone use, like advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stylus' specifically because the description says they will work with my cell phone. They do not. I love stylus's but I specifically want something to work with my cell phone. This is the reason why I'm giving it a 3 star review. I have plenty of them and I bought these specific ones for use with my cell phone, which does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Great product great Value
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give these a try as I was SO tired of spending $$$ on stylus pens and losing them ! Well I made the right choice ! * 4 of them! Great colors There a 2 size rubber heads ( one on either side) depending on your size of screen . I’m using the small one for my iPad and works great. * Also which is important to me is the length, it’s a great size ! No mini or trying to hold onto something tiny..and has good weight to it..I have arthritis in my hand and it’s quite comfortable! You also get Several replacement rubber heads in both sizes...
customer_reviews.author: eyeshaveit

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: This stylus is fine for what it is, but the small tips aren't very sensitive. It takes a significant amount of pressure for my screens to register them. My issue is with the vendor's quality control. The 4-pack I received somehow contained only one stylus, but with the appropriate two bags of replacement tips. I emailed the MekoTech, who generously sent a replacement 4-pack without making me go through the hassle of a return. The new pack contained the appropriate 4 styluses, but somehow two bags of fine tips and zero broad ones. Fortunately the two screwed-up packs add up to a whole as-advertised pack, but I won't likely order from MekoTech again.
customer_reviews.author: Coprolalia

customer_reviews.title: Finally a stylus that works for me!!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply the best! I love them - very accurate and easy for me to hold as I have arthritis in my hands pretty bad. I love the smaller end also as it helps when clicking on a link. They are so easy for me to use and colors are very pretty. LOVE, LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: So, what's the dif?
customer_reviews.text: This stylus does not produce the result I had expected. The regular sized stylus I purchased from the Friendly Swede months ago makes just as fine a line in programs as the rubber point on this stylus. The drawing programs available for iPad and iPhones could make this useful if it produced a finer line while drawing. But, the amount of pressure necessary for an imprint to register is greater than the stylus that I already have and is a distraction when I'm trying to do a script text or drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Bob E.Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and. of. good quality
customer_reviews.text: if you need a standard pen for you tablet I definitely recommend this one. It works well and has a good touch. The tips do wear out after awhile and loses it contact and accuracy. Recommend you change the tips as soon as you notice it does not react as well. Also oreder extra tips, depending how heavy you use will depend on the life of the tips. Also, try to touch the screen gently and not press real hard. A harder press does not do much good and wears down the tip faster.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Touch Screen Pen
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend these touch screen pens. 2 different size tips in each pen. Very comfortable in your hand - light feeling so easy to use for extended period of time. Accurate when using on touch screen; also comes with additional rubber tips. Only downsize for me is the clip on the pen cap. I never would take this pen and clip it on my pocket. It would be nice if there was a choice of a pack of pens without the clip - most women would probably prefer no clip on the cap.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA SANDERS

customer_reviews.title: Smaller tips
customer_reviews.text: Love the small tip. The tips on typical styluses are too fat. Easier to see past the small tip to the contact point than to see past a fat tip. Even the larger tip on the other end of the stylus is smaller than what I had before. Amount of pressure needed to activate my Kindle doesn't seem outrageous. The tip material doesn't deform drastically. Tips should last a while. And there are four of styluses. Win.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Bargain Depot - Capacitive Stylus
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the name "Bargain Depot " scare you . . . These are the best I have used ! Love the colors also having the extra rubber tips is a big plus ! I even purchased more from Bargain Depot, to give as gifts ! I really like that the tips on these are nice and thin which allow for greater precision when typing, click on small links. I can't tell you how many time I try to click on one thing and my old large stylus would hit the edge of another link which takes me to a page I didn't want to go to.
customer_reviews.author: Pat_A

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I go through stylus pens faster than anyone I know either by losing it or just wearing the rubber tips down. It is so easy to hold & use and I absolutely love that I can change the tips out when I wear one out. Although I haven't checked it out yet I am hoping I can order more tips when I run out of the ones that come with it. If you felt in a stylus, it is more than worth it to purchase this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: WON'T WORK ON MY iPHONE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack a few months ago. Gave one to a friend to use on her tablet. Was still finishing up a pack of much shorter ones until today. Went for one of these........ will NOT work on my iPhone at all, even though they advertise to work on smartphones. So a waste of my money. I thought the longer one would be easier to handle. Guess it's back to the smaller ones. I wouldn't have put ANY stars, except it won't take my review without at least 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter stylus. I use it on my Kindle. The only thing I don't like, which is why I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5, is because you can't really hold it at an angle like you normally would with a pen or pencil, or the metal side of the stylus rubs against the screen, so I've had to retrain myself on how to hold it. And sometimes the tip doesn't respond with the screen well. But, I got what I paid for and it is doing what I need for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie's Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE AND STYLE
customer_reviews.text: THE LITTLE RUBBER THINGS THAT MAKE THIE STYLUS FUNCTION IS THE BACKBONE AND IS OF A VERY LOW QUALITY. VERY FLIMSY AND NOT VERY DURABLE BUT I WOULD GIVE IT TEN STARS IF THAT WERE THE SITUATION. MY WRISTS ARE FUSED AND I COULD USE A LARGER STYLUS TO HOLD IT IS ALSO CONVINIENT THAT BOTH ENDS ARE RUBBER TIPPED BUT TO REPLACE THE TIPS MORE OFTEN IS NOT EASY FOR ME. BECAUSE OF MY DISABILITY OF NOT HAVING GOOD DEXTERITY IN MY HANDS AND FINGERS.
customer_reviews.author: R t lord

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: i do a lot of coloring apps on my Kindle - some of the stylus that say they work on kindle don't work on mine. I had some before that were great - but they were very small and hard to hold sometimes, and after a while - the rubber tip comes off - no chance of replacing. this product comes with 4 pens. Wider tip, narrower tip, replacements, and it's about the size of a regular pen - I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kaserman

customer_reviews.title: Stylus has a nice smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: Stylus has a nice smooth finish, has some weight to it and seems very well made. I have a Samsung Note3 that comes with it's own stylus and most generic stylus will not work on my phone but this one does. It says it was supposed to come with a Bonus of 20 Extra Replacement Tips and it didn't. It only had four each of the 4.5mm and 6 mm replacement tips. Had those been included I would have given this product five stars as it was one of the reasons I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: KSF

customer_reviews.title: Good for drawing games
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my drawing games since they offer a thinner tip. They work well. It's no fine tip stylus & can't hold a candle to my hubby's S Pen, but for an amateur drawer like me it does well & allows me to get a finer line & more control. It comes with several replacement tips & 4 stylus so I'll be ready when I inevitably lose one. There is only 1 cap per pen even though each end has a stylus tip.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Received the 4 styli in the colors as shown. They arrived in excellent condition in an air-tight pouch. Each stylus is also individually wrapped. The extra tips come in two re-sealable pouches. It's apparent that exposure to air will cause the tips to degrade over time. Because my current styli (of a different brand) are still working fairly well, I intend on keeping these new ones sealed-up until needed. At this time I can say nothing about their functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Bob, the engineer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: My purchase for this product did not work well for what I needed. MekoTech (Sarah) customer representative was very helpful and went above and beyond to assist me in finding the right stylus for my needs. I’m very satisfied with my purchase and all the help this company’s customer service. I highly recommend to reach out their customer service if you are unsure which stylus is best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Irene-Kiki

customer_reviews.title: They don't work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pack of 4 of these and used the first, second and third one today before pitching the entire package. There's nothing sensitive about these things. I practically broke the keys on my iPhone hammering away on them as I attempted to print a text. Back to Targus!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel 333

customer_reviews.title: Its all going electronically anyways
customer_reviews.text: 4 stylus pens plus the additional rubber tips was enough to give some away. I use the stylus on my HP Pavilion touch screen laptop and Amazon Fire tablet which is perfect for both. Its easier to touch the screen with the pen than my large fingers also signing work documents after completion. Now ofcourse with everyone working from home and how pretty much everything going electronically anyways I have my own personal pen
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Middlebrooks

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the tips fixed
customer_reviews.text: I do like the size and weight of these. But this new set I bought seems to have very weak tips. The other set, same brand, had tips that lasted for a long time. These new ones split within two days. I'm forever changing tips. Very disappointed. I sure hope they get better tips because these are really poor quality. ADDED to the original review.... The company sent me new tips that work great. Thank you Bargains Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Do not work !!!!
customer_reviews.text: These do not work on my tablet or phone. Was told that these can be problematic if your device has a screen protector on it. Which all of mine do. They need to state this in the item description so potential buyers are aware of this flaw BEFORE they spend money on this product. Rather than to be told this fact after making a purchase. I purchased these to replace some inexpensive stylus pens I had wore out, that worked flawlessly on all my devices, with screen protectors. I will be throwing these away and will place another order for the inexpensive pens like I purchased before. Don't waste your money on these.
customer_reviews.author: SKOOTERBUM

customer_reviews.title: These Do Not Work!!!  (Unless you want to scratch your screen!)
customer_reviews.text: With all the 4- & 5-star reviews, I still should have heeded the 1-star review that warned these do not work!! I have used a stylus before, so I know they can be quite helpful. I bought them for my mom to use on an iPad. I guess I’ll have ro keep looking for another set. I am so very disappointed with these; they *do* work — but you have to press so hard that I’m afraid the metal setting will scratch the screen. They certainly will not be of any good use to my mom.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Best capacitive stylus that I've found to date!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY . . . a capacitive stylus which lasts longer than a week! A tip at each end! Cap is reversible (can be placed on either end of the stylus) Tips are easy to clean. I clean them with lens cleaning wipes when I clean my glasses and tablet screen. Cleaning the tips occasionally, reduces sticking and restores their capacitive functionality. Tips are easily replaced. Replacement tips are inexpensive. I've tried a bunch of styluses and this one tops them all! Montana Bob
customer_reviews.author: Montana Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to believe that I'd never used a stylus until this past summer when they handed me one at the doctor's office. I ordered these soon after for two reasons -- that they have replaceable tips and for the length. I wish they were just a tad longer, but otherwise they're ideal. My husband tried one when they arrived and immediately claimed two for himself. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: V's stylus
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Great value for the money. Bold and bright colors make them easy to spot whether in a purse or on a messy desk. Having both ends usable makes them seem like I am getting something extra at no additional cost. And extra tips are also included in the whole package. Could not ask for more! Customer service responded to my email quickly and were extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact there are two sizes to use for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact there are two sizes to use for different size text. The colors are beautiful. I like the fact that there is an end cap to cover the unused end. the price is very good. Shipment was fast and the stylus was exactly as described. Would recommend to buy. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My Wife and I are loving these stylus pens. They are well made and work very well with out Galaxy s10 phones. I will definitely recommend these to others looking for a quality stylus pens Uodate: My Wife, Daughter and I have been using these B&D Stylus Pens for nearly 2 weeks now. Could not be happier with these pens. Will definitely be purchasing more just to keep spares on hand...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Herzberger

customer_reviews.title: The best stylus for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This package Bargain Depot stylus are fairly long, two ended & of substantial weight , making them easy to use on all of my touch screens. They work on all my touch screens from my pc to my tablets as well as my phones. They also have easy to use "screw" on caps that make it easy to change the rubber tips when they tear on you. (Two bags of rubber tips are included!). I have a poor habit of losing my stylus & find that these stylus are a "bargain" to replace! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Love it in every way!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I usually get the cheaper ones that are shorter and the metal top looks like the push top of a retractable pen. The last one I used was sharp on top. You can tell it came out of the mold that way. When I lost my last one (I lose them easily, hence the hunt for cheap ones), I decided to get a different style that wouldn’t have a sharp top. I saw these. So nice! The ball part is nice and precise. (Had to REALLY push on iPad to register movement.) Looks stylish. Love it in every way!
customer_reviews.author: Modi

customer_reviews.title: A STYLUS with STYLE !!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY !! A Stylus pen I can use with total confidence. Having just purchased a new Tablet and cellphone, I was very desirous to protect and keep them in pristine condition. I purchased various items to help me with this however, no two Stylus' are alike. In fact, many are faulty with huge heads, sharp edges which can scratch your screen. Finally, I ordered the Bargains Depot Stylus Pens with addtn'l heads and WOW, life was good! Even doing Word Search Games became easier as I could see where my tip was marking. Thanks for making my life better!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.....
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the tip and stem, However I sometimes have to tap on an icon 2 or 3 times before it launches . I don't care for that type of reaction because I want the app to launch on the 1st touch. I even set my touch screen to super sensitive to see if that work. It was the same result. Despite that, It's not worth returning them because they still work. I guess I can't be too picky.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just have a hard touch, but the rubber tips only last a day or two, The tip is not very receptive, and I had to press over and over to make anything happen on my screen. I'll be giving these away. Perhaps someone else will have better luck with them than I did. I've gone back to a fiber mesh tipped stylus, which works much better for me. Update - the company contacted me due to my original negative review posted above, and replaced the tips with a batch that is working extremely well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Brooks

customer_reviews.title: My favorite stylus.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these stylus for quite some time now. They're attractive and have held up quite well. The rubber tips come with replacements for when one does begin to fail. I use them regularly to drag items across my tablet screen and they don't hang up or stutter, they've stayed smooth and supple. Even though I have several others, these are my go to for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Finally a small tip that works!!!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!! I needed a small tip for highlighting specific words in my e-textbook. I just tested it and it works great!! I prefer the small tip. I'm not disappointed with this item. Plus, it comes with extra tips, large and small. I use it with my Amazon Fire 8 tablet. I recommend this...you get 4 pens and the colors are bright and nice. Perfect color mix for male and female choices.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna M.

customer_reviews.title: Helps to Point Things Out
customer_reviews.text: A nice product not only does it do what it is supposed to do, it does it in 2 sizes a small petite size for texting, and a bold size for those moments when you are trying to point and click something on the computer.. I'm sure you will enjoy it as much as I do.. Oh yea...! It clips into your shirt pocket when your on the go and want to bring it along...
customer_reviews.author: Zachary E. Mohrmann

customer_reviews.title: Stylus
customer_reviews.text: The replacement stylus, without question, is the best I have used. The weight and length are excellent. Screen touch using the disk tip or fiber tip is outstanding. I am convinced that any future purchase of stylus will be of this type and most likely from MekoTech. Extremely important to me is your immediate follow-up and action you have taken to insure my satisfaction with your product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby J. Sealock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, better than many styluses I have used.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for everything I do on my phone and tablet. They work better than many styluses I have used. I'm glad they come with lots of extractions, because I go through stylus tips really fast. Maybe because I use them for so many word games so instead of just touching a screen I need to slide the tip around a lot, so they tear too easily. But having extras available helps.
customer_reviews.author: Rothy Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Love dual-end design!
customer_reviews.text: Love these styluses! I used mine on my iPad and they work perfectly. I love the dual end too. One end is smaller than the other but neither is "big". I like to use a stylus when I play online games (like Bingo) because the larger end works great in some spots while the smaller end is great for bingo daubing. Very precise. These come with in assorted colors so I can keep one in several different places. Plus, the extra tips that are included means you won't be buying a new stylus for a long time. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: LanellH

customer_reviews.title: These Stylus Pens are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just upgraded our cell phones and tablets and I decided to order some new stylus pens. I liked that these came with extra rubber tips, and that they have a rubber tip on both ends of the pen. They are very comfortable to hold/use, the tip works very well on both my cell phone and my tablet screens. I will definitely be purchasing more of these pens in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Mehaffie

customer_reviews.title: Suits the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking. I like the colors. I also like the dual tips, a large and small, for different uses. The smaller tip has a cover that screws over the top, which is nice. I wish the screw-on cap, when removed from the smaller side, could be screwed over the larger tip. They are different sizes, though, and can't, so you're left with looking for a place to safely keep that "cap." Not a big deal, just something to mention. I'd purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: The best touch screen stylus i have ever used..
customer_reviews.text: This product work great. It's unbelievable accurate that I can operate my phone quickly. I have used other touch pens that my phone couldn't detect or I had to select something by holding the pen in place for a few seconds. What a complete waste of time. Not this one...Great value for your money and It comes with extra tips which I have never had to replace yet. I recommend this product to everyone....
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Pocket Space
customer_reviews.text: My original stylus that inserts into my phone eventually broke. After trying some aftermarket look-alikes (with which I was not happy), I tried this four pack. They are great. They have two (different-sized) tips, one of which can be covered by the cap. They include replacement tips, because one does occasionally wear out. I even added a packet of inexpensive replacement tips to insure that it will be years before I am without this stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Lester M. Siglin

customer_reviews.title: Got this for a first grader..
customer_reviews.text: With social distancing and schooling done online I got this for my first graders. Rather she write things down at this age. I’m a little town on what to give the review. The product looks nice.. seems of average-good quality.. but when using it on the touch screen we both had some trouble. The smaller one didn’t work on our Chromebooks or my phone. If using as a mouse it worked well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Addy M.

customer_reviews.title: Stylus tips not working this time
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these from Bargains Depot, and have also purchased the tips separately. They don't last long, but they always worked well, and the price is reasonable. This time though, the tips are awful. They stick to my phone's screen and have so much "drag" that they are useless for swiping (texts and games). This happens whether the phone is cool or has warmed up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: They work great, but don't last
customer_reviews.text: These stylus pens work great, but the tips wear out relatively fast. I've had mine for about 3 months, and I have worn out 5 tips already, they are made of thin flimsy material. and they tend to rip if you drag them across a screen. While they are new, and even after they are broken, they still do work, you just have to be careful to not scratch your screen
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but no go.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed to find that this stylus does not work well with the ipad screen protector that I put on my ipad. Guess these will just go in the bag with all the other stylus I have. Had they worked with my ipad, I liked the 2-in-1 aspect and the fact that it came with so many tip replacements, but unfortunately not usable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H.

customer_reviews.title: Work great in the cold
customer_reviews.text: I use these in a -20 degree freezer to interact with touchscreen scan guns. I did have to modify them a slight bit in order to make them work for my application. I had to apply blue loctite on the threads of the sleeve that surrounds the rubber part. The fact that sleeve is on there at all is the reason I choose these over another stylus. When a stylus that just has the rubber pointer over a lip in the metal is taken into a cold environment the metal shrinks and the rubber part comes off rendering the stylus useless. With that sleeve it still shrinks but the sleeve holds the rubber part on.
customer_reviews.author: 90miata

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Work
customer_reviews.text: These do not work on my iPhone (7) or iPad (Air 2). To swipe to change screens I have to swipe several times before anything happens. To open an app I have to tap it several times. On the iPhone its worse, sometimes it never works. On my old Android that I won’t be using anymore they work better but that does me no good. I’ll be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: cany58

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE These!!!! With a fine tip, great for Colorific Book Coloring. Would buy again and again!!!!!!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE These!!!! With a fine tip, great for Colorific Book Coloring. Would buy again and again!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KerZar19

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find around the house.
customer_reviews.text: I love these cell phone pens. I only have one eye and my thumbs and fingers were always hitting the wrong letters. I had a small black pen, but I was always losing it around the house. Now with this set of four, beautiful, bright colored pens I can always find at least one of them. I also love knowing I have extra tips. These were made especially for me, thank God.
customer_reviews.author: Jane White

customer_reviews.title: Two different sizes in each stylus!!
customer_reviews.text: Each stylus is so light weight and comfortable in the hand. They come with a bolder exposed tip and a hidden narrower tip. Quite unique in my book. They work very well through tempered glass covers on my phone that other stylus' were failing. The different color casings are pleasing to the eye. I highly recommend these. The extra package of tips are a big bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Trish M

customer_reviews.title: Small and light styli for small hands
customer_reviews.text: I have small arthritic hands, and am always looking for a small, light stylus I find easy to use. I also like a stylus with a working tip at each end, so I won't accidentally scratch my tablet. This one is perfect, and the extra rubber tips are helpful. These might be good styli for kids. A hint for users: The silver tip covers fit on both ends, so it is easy to cannibalize one stylus for the extra tip cover, and then pass it along as you move to the next one. That gives you two neat ends.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set because it had the dual tips, replacement tips aplenty, and because the colors matched the favorite colors of everyone in the family. I have used my green one nearly every day for the last month. The tip has not worn out yet. I usually use the fatter tip, unless I am drawing or need other precision. My only wish would be to have two caps so both ends can be capped for storage. Otherwise, these styluses are near perfect in my view.
customer_reviews.author: C.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Just as described & better.
customer_reviews.text: I was not too sure about ordering this stylus product, but thought I would give it a try. This is one of the best products I have ordered in a while. This is just as described. It's great for my iPad & my phone. I have trouble with my fingers being too big for the buttons. This stylus with the replacement tips has bee very good. The rubber tips are great, & not too soft, as some are, making them difficult to use. Buy this, U will be happy with it too...
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyray

customer_reviews.title: Everyone likes B&D
customer_reviews.text: It says B&D on the cap. "Oh, do you like B&D?" they ask. Why yes! The stylus is double ended, so one tip is always getting dirty. Two tips, one cap. Nobody likes a dirty tip! I wish it was single ended or retracted. They seem well made, and they're a good size to keep in a pocket, so I don't have to touch screens in the checkout line. One star off for the dirty tip.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: They're perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purchase these because when I'm out doing deliveries I prefer to wear my gloves. The gloves are touchscreen friendly, but don't always work properly, so what ends up happening is a lot of time I have to remove my gloves partially to be able to navigate the delivery apps in my phone. Having the stylus prevents this issue since I can still use these and keep my gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: DLeon86

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for writing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these two tutor math online, and I couldn't write any numbers or anything with it. I was using it on a touch screen laptop, and it was useless. It was easier to use my finger because the writing was so choppy, it couldn't even draw straight line without chopping it up into tiny pieces. Very weird, very annoyed, return to immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know how great a stylus could be!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a friend.. Pkg came with 4.. So 2 for her & 2 for me. Wow! I didn't know how much I would like a stylus! Great for me with arthritis in right hand.. Hold like a pen & no finger cramping! Another plus.. More accurate in texting on phone, typing on my tablet & playing my games on tablet! Four colors, two different tip sizes, extra tips & you can't beat the price. Cost me almost as much to send the 2 as it did to buy all 4! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent performance = frustration.
customer_reviews.text: So excited to try these yet, wish I had first done a Fakespot.com review analysis (F), before buying. These are nice looking and well balanced, but they do not consistently connect to the screen: IPhone and Fire HD 10, which hinders any projects. I practiced writing, drawing, texting and using different tips with these for an hour to be fair. Save your dough and doing some more research, like me.
customer_reviews.author: Bitsy_Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: This early review is for build, appearance, function and design. It may be 5 stars out of five eventually, but for now four will have to suffice. These pens are well designed and work as advertised. I like them very much. They come with replacement tips, and directions describing how (paraphrasing) they're designed to wear out, thus protecting the touch screen they are not wearing on - sort of. They work well. They do not harm your bazillion dollar device, and they don't leave nasty fingerprints all over.
customer_reviews.author: Sue d'Nimm

customer_reviews.title: They alright
customer_reviews.text: These are good but always have to press semi hard which makes the rubber start to tear and etc!! Not 100% compared to my finger but they work good as long as you use the smaller end, the bigger end kinda tends to drags and just doesn't work for me. Glad they gave my spare stuff or I be out of them. They don't last for very long. Only way they are easy to use if you out oil on your phone which common who does that? I used them to help edit photos they work alright sometimes glitch. Wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Nifty stylus that works great with my phone and Kindle. Exactly what I was looking for. Nice to have two different sized tips to choose from and appreciate the extra tips that were included, as well. The colors I received are a bit different than what I thought I was ordering, which ended up being a good thing as the colors I received are awesome (bright turquoise, purple, black and green). Changing out tips is super easy.

product_meta.title: Bargains Depot (4Pcs) [New Upgraded] 2-in-1 Universal Capacitive Stylus/styli 5.5"L with 20 Pcs Replacement Rubber Tips - (Black/Blue/Purple/Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:1Black/Blue/Purple/RedWhat's the New Upgraded Version? - Add a 6mm rubber tip on other end of this stylus, add a cap, changed to a high quality and flexible clip 

 Model: [0.18-inch Smaill Tip Series] 2-in-1 stylus
Color: (Black/Blue/Purple/Red) 

 ABOUT THE STYLUS
Length:5.5"(140mm);
Pen tube diameter 0.37"(9.5mm);
The Small Rubber Tip diameter: 0.18" (4.5mm) - one end 
The Second Thin Rubber tip Diameter:0.24 (6mm) - Another end
Weight: 20g 
Rubber tip Feature: Replaceable 
Materiel: Made from stainless steel and Aluminum, no plastic parts, real pen feeling

 Compatibility: 
The Stylus is 100% compatible with all capacitive touchscreen devices;Apple, Android and Windows Smartphone's and 5V Tablet; (Compatible with Apple iPad 1 and 2, iPhone, iPod, Kindle Fire, Kindle Touch, Motorola Xoom Tablet, Galaxy, and Blackberry Playbook Virtuoso Touch) 

 Stylus Specifications:
Compared with regular capacitive stylus tips

 Bargains Depot small tips radius - 0.09 inch and 0.12 inch
Regular capacitive stylus tips - 0.20 inch


Please Note:The Bargains Depot stylus have a small rubber tip, but do not confuse with a fine point stylus tip ! What's in the package? 
4 packs styluses (Black/Blue/Purple/Red) 
12 Pcs 4.5mm rubber tips 
8 Pcs 6mm rubber tips 

 GENERAL ADVICE:
due to the non-durable nature of the capacitive touchscreen (iPad, smartphones, etc.) the tip has to be soft. Treat the stylus like a small, soft-tipped paint brush and stroke the screen. If the tip is collapsing or if you tore the tip off quickly, they you trying to write with the stylus versus stroking the screen.." "..Soft tip styli do not last. 2-5 months of daily use and they are done....product is disposable.. "

 Note: To find extra replacement tips, please search ASIN: B00MT0Q4XG on Amazon.

 Size of rubber tip do NOT vary!
feature_bullets: BARGAINS DEPOT STYLUS- Length:5.5"(140mm); Pen Barrel diameter 0.37"(9.5mm); Two different sizes Rubber tip diameter: 0.18" (4.5mm) / 024" (6mm); Made from stainless steel and Aluminum, no plastic parts, real pen feeling

ACCURACY: The Small Rubber Tip allows you select small icons ,click small links and gives you the accurate selection.Perfect for drawing apps,Conveniently designed in pen form, perfect for carrying around - 100% Compatible with all capacities touch screen devices (Apple iPad , iPhone, iPod, Kindle , Tablet, Galaxy& more)
2-IN-1 FEATURE: One end - 4.5mm Rubber tips, the other end: 6mm Rubber tip ;
REPLACEABLE TIP FEATURE: Both two ends rubber tips are replaceable. Replacing can be done within a second without tool , Extend lifetime of the stylus

Package included: 4 Pieces Styluses,20 Pieces Replacement Tips; To find extra replacement tips, 0.18“ Tip - please search ASIN: B00MT0Q4XG on Amazon; To find extra replacement tips, 0.24“ Tip - please search ASIN: B01N9F41US on Amazon
